description: The RECO ontology defines the vocabulary for representing preferences-as-constraints and preferences-as-ratings as RDF graphs.  This lightweight vocabulary provides domain-independent means to describe user profiles in a coherent and context-aware way.  RECO has been designed as an extension of both [Friend-Of-A-Friend (FOAF)](/none/foaf) and [Who Am I! (WAI)](/treelogic/wai) ontologies.
name: RECommendations Ontology (RECO)
